attributes.action: Fund a campaign to raise awareness about bile duct cancer
attributes.additional_details: The Government has said there are no plans to run a specific public awareness campaigns on bile duct cancer. This must change.
attributes.background: Bile duct cancer affects thousands of people in the UK, but is currently little known. An awareness campaign could help raise awareness of this cancer across the public and healthcare workers, and encourage people experiencing symptoms to seek medical attention, and help improve diagnosis.

departments.name: Department of Health and Social Care
